author: Tony Tobin
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place the aubergine halves, oil, honey, soy sauce and chilli flakes into a bowl and toss together. Place into a medium ovenproof frying pan over a high heat and stir fry for three minutes then transfer to the oven to roast for five minutes. Remove from the oven and place onto a warm plate. Sprinkle over the chopped coriander and serve immediately, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: 4 baby aubergines, halved,  2 tbsp honey,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  pinch dried chilli flakes ,  1 tsp chopped fresh coriander ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
